General.Name: Hoasen Group
General.Description: Hoa Sen Group manufactures and sells steel sheets in Vietnam. The company manufactures and sells roofing sheets by galvanized steel sheets, aluminum zinc alloy coated steel sheets, paint galvanized zinc plating products, pre-paint galvanized steel, and plating of other alloys; steel and galvanized purlins; black steel pipes, galvanized steel pipes, and other alloys; steel meshes, galvanized steel wires, and steel wires; and UPVC, HDPE, PP-R plastic pipes. It also buys and sells building materials, capital goods, and consumer goods; provides warehousing and transportation services; manufactures and sells PVC ceiling and cold rolled steel coils; leases machinery, equipment, and other products; and invests in, constructs, and trades in industrial park infrastructure. In addition, the company is involved in the building industrial and civil construction activities; and operates a hotel and restaurant, as well as a commercial center. It also exports its products to approximately 87 countries and territories worldwide. Hoa Sen Group was founded in 2001 is headquartered in Di An, Vietnam.
